  • education

Education

Elementary Education and Secondary Education programs prepare teachers to teach in K-8 public and private schools, and in middle schools and high schools. In addition to completing a teacher education program and residency certificate, students must complete a baccalaureate degree in a subject area that is endorsed by the Office of Superintendent of Public Instruction (OSPI) in Washington State.

Non-Transfer Associate Degrees

  • Eary childhood education/paraeducator (AAAS)
  • Special education (AAAS)
